author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-401 Update to pom to correctly set the broker.dir
Updated examples to build source jar. Also put the java14 retrotranslated module back in now that the strange repeating build problem is solved.
POM update renumbering tests now we have trimmed down the tests being run.
Update to PrincipalDatabase's to ensure they work correctly with # comments.
Various License header updates, missed this file. Though the first update of it via the JMX console will remove the license.
QPID-525 Memory leak in DestWildExchange. Used routing key in remove rather than empty queue

author: jm
msg: bug 5515: libsslspamc.so & libsslspamc.so can not build without -fPIC, but we were picking up the wrong CFLAGS to do this. fix

author: tonywu
msg: Apply the modification of classlib/trunk@548383, which restructrued the source folder for platform specific test

author: jm
msg: bug 5511: fix network lookup timeouts, where lookups were being lost once a timeout was hit; also fix code to match documentation on rbl_timeout's scaling and minimum duration of 1 second; and attempt to collect already-received DNS responses when the timeout is reached. thanks to Mark Martinec

author: jm
msg: bug 5511: fix network lookup timeouts, where lookups were being lost once a timeout was hit; also fix code to match documentation on rbl_timeout's scaling and minimum duration of 1 second; and attempt to collect already-received DNS responses when the timeout is reached. thanks to Mark Martinec
